{{context|date=January 2010}} {{tooshort|date=January 2010}}
'''7th Iowa Film Critics Awards'''
January 14, 2010
----
Best Film:
''' Up in the Air '''
The '''7th Iowa Film Critics Awards''', honoring the best in film for [[2009 in film|2009]], were held on 14 January 2010. ==Winners== *Best Actor: **[[Jeff Bridges]] - ''[[Crazy Heart]]'' *Best Actress: **[[Gabourey Sidibe]] - ''[[Precious (2009 film)|Precious]]'' *Best Animated Feature: **''[[Up (2009 film)|Up]]'' *Best Director: **[[Kathryn Bigelow]] - ''[[The Hurt Locker]]'' *Best Film: **'''''[[Up in the Air (film)|Up in the Air]]''''' *Best Film Yet to Open in Iowa: **''[[Crazy Heart]] *Best Supporting Actor: **[[Christoph Waltz]] - ''[[Inglourious Basterds]]'' *Best Supporting Actress: **[[Mo'Nique]] - ''[[Precious (2009 film)|Precious]]'' ==External links== * [http://moviecitynews.com/archived/awards/2010/critics_awards/iowa.html Awards at Movie City News] {{IFC Awards Chron}} [[Category:Iowa Film Critics Awards]] [[Category:2009 film awards]]
